message: This is the first product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with the best possible products. If you're not satisfied with this one, I'll do my best to provide a better product in the next round. Please consider purchasing this product for $100, and I'll be happy to answer any questions you may have about it.
I'll take the product for $100, but I'm not making any promises about being a repeat customer.

I'm glad you took the chance on the first product! I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with value. Since you've already purchased one product, I'd like to offer you a special deal. If you buy this second product, I'll give you a guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with it, I'll give you a third product of your choice (within reason, of course). This way, you can try out two products and see if you like them, and if not, you'll get a third one to make it right. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the special deal. I'll pass on this product and see what the next one is.

No worries about the previous product! I'm glad you're giving me another chance. I'd like to highlight that this product is one of our premium offerings. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm confident that you'll find it worth the $100 price tag. Would you like to give it a try?
I'll take the product, but I'm not getting my hopes up. I've been burned before.
